mapper.insert: insert into board values (seq_board.nextval, #{ id }, #{ name }, #{ subject }, #{ content }, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: select seq, id, name, subject, content, hit, to_char(logtime, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as logtime from (select rownum rn, tt. * from (select * from board order by seq desc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where seq = #{seq}
update board set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where seq = #{seq}
